com.identos.android.id100.library.ccid

Class UsbReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.identos.android.id100.library.ccid.CcidReader
      • com.identos.android.id100.library.ccid.UsbReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public final class UsbReader
extends CcidReader
implements android.os.Parcelable
    This class represents a attached ID100 reader. Use this class to manage the connection state of the reader. Refer to the helper classes to read data from the reader.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable
